events.message: I just received my order, but the blender is leaking and seems broken right out of the box. Please help!
The customer's report indicates a product defect due to leakage and damage upon delivery.
Assigning case to product support specialist for further assistance with the defective blender issue.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your blender. I’m here to help get this resolved for you.
Could you please send photos showing the damage and confirm if the packaging was also damaged upon arrival?
I have attached pictures of the blender with the leak and the box shows a dent on the corner as well.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit or issue a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement unit if possible. Thank you for your quick assistance.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 2 business days. We appreciate your patience.
Just checking in to ensure the replacement blender arrived in good condition and is working well.
The replacement arrived yesterday and works perfectly. Thanks again for your help!
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing the case now but please contact us if you need anything else.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
